messageBody:
I'm not sure is this the right thing you are looking for, but to run JUnit Suite class, for JUnit 4 clasess that have annotation style@, you can write as this example in your Test suite() method:

public class AllTests {

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite("Test for default package");
// $JUnit-BEGIN$

Test modelTwoTestClass = new JUnit4TestAdapter(ModelTwoTest.class);
Test modelOneTestClass = new JUnit4TestAdapter(ModelOneTest.class);

suite.addTest(modelTwoTestClass);
suite.addTest(modelOneTestClass);

// $JUnit-END$
return suite;
}
}
